resources.string: The content entered does not meet the requirements, please re-enter
The value entered is too small, it must be at least %s
The value entered is too large, it can only be up to %s
Pojav Zenith Horizon needs permission to manage all files on the device to use this feature properly. Please enable the permission!
The launcher will delete this path, but it will not delete the files saved in the corresponding path. You can re-add this path after deletion.
Task in progress, path management features are temporarily unavailable
Please download the corresponding dependency Mods as needed. Missing necessary dependency Mods will result in the game not running!
This operation will delete this instance, but it will not delete the game files associated with the instance
Only download and install OptiFine as a Mod. Please ensure the selected instance supports running OptiFine Mod

Your Microsoft account login information seems to have expired. This often happens after the account password has been changed. Please remove the current account and log in again to reset your login information.
Username conflicts with an existing account, please choose a new name!

A valid username supports only letters (both uppercase and lowercase), numbers, and underscores. The length must not be less than 2 characters or exceed 16 characters.
Correct username examples: Name, Name_, Name123
Incorrect username examples: Name@, N ame, Name(123)
However, if you are using a related mod or plugin that bypasses this mechanism, you can continue using this name, otherwise, please rename it!
Please log in with at least one official Minecraft account. We do not recommend launching Minecraft without a legitimate account.
It seems you are not logged in with an official account! The offline account option is intended for players who cannot connect to the internet, not for those without a legitimate account.
It seems you are not logged in with an official account! Are you sure you want to use external login without an official account?
If you do not have a Minecraft official account, please purchase one from the official Minecraft website first!
Within the runtime environment, please try to use JRE 8 for better stability.
There is no description available for this layout…
This is the default control layout file. Click to manage this layout.
Are you sure you want to set this control layout as the default control layout?
There are no control layouts here, restarting the app will generate a new default control layout
By opening the virtual mouse management interface, you can add your preferred virtual mouse images and use them.
The currently selected virtual mouse is the default virtual mouse, and does not support sharing, renaming, or deleting operations.
Open the launcher background image management interface, where you can add your favorite background images and set different backgrounds for each interface.
Click the \"Select\" button to set this image as the background for %s.
Successfully set the background image for %s:
The background image for %s has been reset.
There are no background images here, please add some images first!
Please select a file with the suffix %s
Please select the action you want to perform on this file
Please select the action you want to perform on this folder
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
When deleting a folder, all the files inside it will be deleted as well. If there are important files inside this folder, please cancel this operation!
Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
This operation will permanently delete all selected items. Please proceed with caution!
The file name cannot be empty!
File name conflicts with an existing file!
Currently, a total of %d items are selected
Please select the type of log file
Control how much memory is allocated to Minecraft
Current memory usage: %s / %s, Free memory size: %s
The current memory allocation exceeds available memory size
Automatically set the game language to the selected language when the game starts
Ignore the language set in the game and force it to the game language set in the launcher
Enable the log output interface when the application officially starts running the game
Enable log output on game startup
Set whether to play animation when switching launcher interface
Set the speed of the launcher animation playback
Set the opacity of the main page of the launcher
Should the launcher exit when the game officially begins running?
Display memory information in real-time on the game menu floating window. Long-press the game menu floating window to quickly toggle this option.
You can customize this prefix text according to your needs.
Set the opacity of the game menu floating window.
This setting has been changed, but requires the app to be restarted to take effect!
The launcher has detected that your device has an Adreno GPU. Enabling this option may cause the Zink renderer to not function properly. Are you sure you want to enable this option?

The application/game exited with code %d. Please refer to the log file or crash report for specific error details. If you are unable to resolve this issue yourself, please send the log file or crash report to someone who can help you!\n\nDo not just screenshot the current application interface, as no one will know what happened. Please share your log file or crash report!
Failed to find a suitable runtime environment, set to the runtime environment selected by the current instance
The game is running, you can open the log output through the menu to check the game\'s running status
Please select a modpack file that can be imported by the launcher!
This file is not supported by the launcher!
Check and clean up the cache files of the application, clearing the cache files does not affect the normal use of the application
Cleaning completed, a total of %s cache files have been cleared this time.
Get and update to the latest version
Network exception, unable to get updates temporarily!
Network error, unable to fetch updates temporarily! Error code: %d
The latest installation package has been downloaded. Do you want to install it? Package location:
Please select the authentication server type
Please enter the Yggdrasil API authentication server address
An error occurred while logging in：\n
Server can not be empty, please check the authentication server settings!
The current account has multiple roles. Please select the role you want to use.

The launcher needs to install these components to ensure Minecraft starts properly. These components are included in the app and need to be extracted for normal use. Click the button below to start extracting and updating these components.
The launcher is extracting these components. Once extraction is complete, it will automatically enter the main interface. Please be patient.
Lightweight Java Game Library, Minecraft depends on it to run the game.
Provides a portable GUI backend for OpenJDK.
Java 8 environment, Minecraft 1.16- depends on Java 8.
Java 17 environment, Minecraft 1.17+ depends on Java 17.
Java 21 environment, Minecraft 1.20.5+ depends on Java 21.

Pojav Zenith Horizon is a Minecraft launcher based on the modified version of PojavLauncher that allows Minecraft: Java Edition to be played on Android devices. Pojav Zenith Horizon is committed to improving user experience by redesigning the application interface and adding more useful features to make it easier for more people to enjoy Minecraft.
Pojav Zenith Horizon is carefully crafted by the individual, MovTery, who has made significant modifications to the PojavLauncher.

Since PojavLauncher uses the GPL 3.0 open source license, this license is \"infectious,\" and any code that uses, modifies, or derives from GPL libraries or software must also adopt the GPL license for open source. Therefore, Pojav Zenith Horizon must also follow the GPL 3.0 open source license. If you intend to spread or distribute this software, please be sure to comply with the relevant provisions of the GPL 3.0 open source license.
The following are all the sponsors supporting the development. Thank you so much!
The primary author of the launcher
The development team of PojavLauncher, who developed and open-sourced PojavLauncher
The launcher uses Mod and integration pack Chinese translations from MC Wiki
Provided rendering technical support for the launcher
Provided technical support for the launcher
Provided technical support and fixed some bugs for the launcher
The launcher uses the BMCLAPI mirror source created by them
The launcher uses the MCIM Mod info mirror source created by them
Click this button to close and return to the previous interface.
Click this button to refresh the current content.
When there are too many control layouts, click this button to summon a search box and use it to search for the desired control layout!
Click to open Android\'s file manager, select your control layout file, and import it into the launcher!
Click this button to quickly create a new control layout!
Click this button to quickly reset the background image of the currently selected interface.
Click to open Android\'s file manager, select your background image file, and import it into the launcher!
Click to enter the native file manager, select your virtual mouse image file, and import it into the launcher!
Want to search files quickly? Click this button to summon a search box and use it to search for files.
Click to enter Android\'s file manager, select the file you want to import, and import it into the launcher!
Click this button to create a new folder in the current directory.
Click to confirm selection of this directory.
Click to summon a search box and use it to quickly search for the Mod you\'re looking for.
In the native file manager, select a Mod file and import it into the current Mod folder.
Click to enter the Mod download page, where you can search and download Mods online.
Click this button to create a new game path.

Most of this software is developed and maintained by me alone. If you find this software helpful and are in a position to do so, please consider sponsoring me to give me more motivation to continue developing and improving it. Thank you for your support!
